"...Just listen to what I have to say first."

"...Alas, it's unlikely that I can

"Faria's own consciousness is unaffected.
You've been listening to everything, right, Faria?"
"...Yes. I can hear you, Zephetto."
"Oh, thank goodness. She's okay, then."

"All four of you come here alone."
"...I'll be waiting."
"...Zephetto?"

"Faria, how are you feeling? Is your body alright?"
"Yes, I'm alright."
"...Thank goodness."
"So Zephetto was alive all this time..."
"He's certainly... capricious."
"I didn't expect him to show up like THAT, though..."
"Tell me about it... Sheesh."

"So Zephetto is... here, then."

"While I was off investigating Halpha, these two kept chatting up a storm among themselves."

"Of course."
"...I don't see any other alternatives."
